summary: Charlotte (Gainsbourg) is being raised without a mother. She is only 13 but ready to be an adult. She meets an older boy and begins a relationship while teaching a young friend about life and learning the ropes herself.
cast: Charlotte Gainsbourg|Clothilde Baudon|Julie Glenn|Bernadette Lafont|Jean-Claude Brialy|Jean-Philippe Écoffey|Raoul Billerey|Richard Guerry|Simon de La Brosse|Cédric Liddell|Chantal Banlier|Philippe Baronnet|Louisa Shafa|Armand Barbault|Pascal Bianco-Levrin de Bouzid|Daniel Chevalier
title: L'effrontée
